stories.title: Wheel Component Foundation
stories.description: Create a clean SpinWheel component using HTML5 Canvas (not Three.js - lighter weight). The wheel should: (1) Be a simple circle divided into equal segments, (2) Each segment shows the option text, centered and readable, (3) Use a clean sans-serif font (system-ui), (4) Subtle segment dividers (thin lines, 0.5px, low opacity), (5) Muted color palette - soft grays, whites, one accent color. No gradients or shadows. Think Apple Wallet card simplicity.
stories.verify: Wheel renders with segments, text is readable, looks clean and minimal

stories.title: Smooth Spin Animation
stories.description: Implement butter-smooth spin animation: (1) Use requestAnimationFrame for 60fps, (2) Easing: start fast, decelerate naturally (cubic-bezier or custom easing), (3) Spin duration 3-4 seconds total, (4) Random final position (lands on winner), (5) No wobble or bounce - clean stop. The deceleration should feel physical and satisfying, like a real wheel slowing down. Test on mobile to ensure no frame drops.
stories.verify: Wheel spins smoothly at 60fps, decelerates naturally, stops cleanly on winner

stories.title: Pointer/Indicator
stories.description: Add a minimal pointer to show the winning segment: (1) Simple triangle or arrow at the top of the wheel, (2) Static (doesn't move), (3) Subtle - same accent color as UI, (4) Maybe a thin line extending to wheel edge. No bouncing, no sounds on tick. Clean and understated.
stories.verify: Pointer clearly indicates winning segment, looks minimal and clean

stories.title: Winner Highlight
stories.description: Subtle winner reveal after spin stops: (1) Winning segment gets slightly brighter or accent-colored background, (2) Smooth fade transition (300ms), (3) Winner text maybe slightly larger or bolder, (4) No confetti, no explosion, no particle effects. Just a clean, confident highlight that says 'this is your answer'. Apple-level restraint.
stories.verify: Winner segment highlighted cleanly after spin, transition is smooth

stories.title: Integration with App
stories.description: Replace the current 3D card animation with the wheel: (1) When user clicks Decide, show the wheel instead of cards, (2) Wheel appears with a subtle fade/scale-in, (3) Auto-spins after appearing (small delay for anticipation), (4) After winner is shown, display the result in existing ResultModal, (5) Keep the starfield Background.tsx as ambient backdrop. Remove or hide the FloatingCard/ShuffleCard components during wheel mode.
stories.verify: Clicking Decide shows wheel, spins, reveals winner, then shows result modal

stories.title: Performance & Polish
stories.description: Final optimization pass: (1) Canvas should be resolution-aware (devicePixelRatio), (2) Text should be crisp on retina displays, (3) Test on low-end mobile - must be smooth, (4) Wheel size responsive (smaller on mobile), (5) Remove any unused Three.js postprocessing imports to reduce bundle. Target: sub-400KB gzipped bundle, 60fps on iPhone SE.
stories.verify: Smooth 60fps on mobile, crisp text, responsive sizing, smaller bundle
